title: so nice of riot to reward me with an honor token
body: and inside the honor token is a garen champ shard. sweet. so worthwhile.

replies.body: I'm honor level 4 and have only received one honor capsule. What's the point of even having them if they're so incredibly rare?
I never used to have a key problem now I have 8 keys and no chest due to the honor system
I don't know, so far I have only randomly gotten keys
